Our next round is called
This Is My...

2.text: where we bring on a mystery guest

3.text:
who has a close connection
to one of our panellists.

will claim it's them

9.text:

connection to the guest

to spot who's telling the truth.

13.text:

this week's special guest -

and it went so badly that

and knock on the door, or...

and knocked on the door.

I was at home just watching

Just like you do, watching

No, so we just made light

despite the fact that she's leaving

with an arachnid
she finds terrifying. Yeah.

No, that's what I said, I said,

And then she went upstairs to the

So I was trying to play it cool,
like I'll sort it out,

like, brooms and stuff

So I get the stick and
I try and move the thing

the vase that was on top

Now, that was just the start

Put it this way, have you ever

251.text: No. So I... So the vase smashes.

253.text:
Now... Now the child comes in,
sees me... Oh, oh.

257.text:
I panicked, saw the broken vase,
saw the child with no shoes on

and just sort of went,

would you please reveal

I booked a stripper

Do you know what? Genuinely,
